basic.floral_language:
Prunus serrulata 
Floriography: wisdom, purity, and noble 
Prunus serrulata is beautiful, revered as the national flower of Japan. 
Prunus serrulata is a kind of trees, which is tall and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, flowers and leaves bloom at the same time or flower blooming after leaves, has single and double petals, color is pure and fresh quietly elegant. Often used for ornamental, and also production of bonsai. 
Prunus serrulata like sufficient sunlight, natural flowering from March to April, ornamental period for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period March-April, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring, once after flowering
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
